title: Can I recite 2 surahs in one rakat to prolong my prayer in Taraweeh
transcript: Zan from Kashmir shik uh so my question is uh because uh odd nights are coming the L nights then can I while praying my t uh recite two suras while both of the suras I don't remember uh fully but it would help me to prolong my prayer in one ra no problem inshallah you try your level best not to make mistakes
